TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IValueConverter

summary.span: 提供将自定义逻辑应用于绑定的方法。

span.span: Provides a way to apply custom logic to a binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要将值转换器与绑定相关联, 请创建一个实现接口的类, 然后实现和方法。If you want to associate a value converter with a binding, create a class that implements the interface and then implement the and methods. 转换器可将数据从一种类型更改为另一种类型, 根据区域性信息转换数据, 或修改演示的其他方面。Converters can change data from one type to another, translate data based on cultural information, or modify other aspects of the presentation. 有关一些典型转换器方案的示例, 请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)中的 "数据转换"。For examples of some typical converter scenarios, see "Data Conversion" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 值转换器识别区域性。Value converters are culture-aware. 和方法都有一个`culture`指示区域性信息的参数。 Both the and methods have a `culture` parameter that indicates the cultural information. 如果区域性信息与转换无关, 则可在自定义转换器中忽略该参数。If cultural information is irrelevant to the conversion, then you can ignore that parameter in your custom converter. 和方法也有一个名`parameter`为的参数, 以便你可以使用具有不同参数的转换器的同一实例。 The and methods also have a parameter called `parameter` so that you can use the same instance of the converter with different parameters. 例如, 你可以编写一个格式转换器, 该转换器根据你使用的输入参数生成不同的数据格式。For example, you can write a formatting converter that produces different formats of data based on the input parameter that you use. 您可以使用类的来将参数作为参数传递到和方法。You can use the of the class to pass a parameter as an argument into the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Convert (object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Convert(object value, class System.Type targetType, object parameter, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed
Public Function Convert (value As Object, targetType As Type, parameter As Object, culture As CultureInfo) As Object
public: System::Object ^ Convert(System::Object ^ value, Type ^ targetType, System::Object ^ parameter, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture);
abstract member Convert : obj * Type * obj * System.Globalization.CultureInfo -> obj

span.span: The value produced by the binding source.
The type of the binding target property.

param.name: culture
param.span: 要用在转换器中的区域性。

span.span: The culture to use in the converter.

returns.span: 如果该方法返回 ，则使用有效的 null 值。

span.span: If the method returns , the valid null value is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定引擎在将值从绑定源传播到绑定目标时会调用此方法。The data binding engine calls this method when it propagates a value from the binding source to the binding target. 数据绑定引擎不会捕获由用户提供的转换器引发的异常。The data binding engine does not catch exceptions that are thrown by a user-supplied converter. 方法所引发的任何异常, 或方法调用的方法所引发的任何未捕获异常均被视为运行时错误。Any exception that is thrown by the method, or any uncaught exceptions that are thrown by methods that the method calls, are treated as run-time errors. 通过返回来处理预期问题。Handle anticipated problems by returning . 的返回值指示转换器没有生成值, 并且绑定将使用 (如果可用) 或默认值。A return value of indicates that the converter produced no value and that the binding uses the , if available, or the default value instead. 返回值指示绑定不传输值或使用或默认值。A return value of indicates that the binding does not transfer the value or use the or default value.

MemberSignature.Value: public object ConvertBack (object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ConvertBack(object value, class System.Type targetType, object parameter, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed
Public Function ConvertBack (value As Object, targetType As Type, parameter As Object, culture As CultureInfo) As Object
public: System::Object ^ ConvertBack(System::Object ^ value, Type ^ targetType, System::Object ^ parameter, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture);
abstract member ConvertBack : obj * Type * obj * System.Globalization.CultureInfo -> obj

span.span: The value that is produced by the binding target.

param.name: culture
param.span: 要用在转换器中的区域性。

span.span: The culture to use in the converter.

returns.span: 如果该方法返回 ，则使用有效的 null 值。

span.span: If the method returns , the valid null value is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定引擎在将值从绑定目标传播到绑定源时调用此方法。The data binding engine calls this method when it propagates a value from the binding target to the binding source. 此方法的实现必须是方法的反向实现。The implementation of this method must be the inverse of the method. 数据绑定引擎不会捕获由用户提供的转换器引发的异常。The data binding engine does not catch exceptions that are thrown by a user-supplied converter. 方法所引发的任何异常, 或方法调用的方法所引发的任何未捕获异常均被视为运行时错误。Any exception that is thrown by the method, or any uncaught exceptions that are thrown by methods that the method calls, are treated as run-time errors. 通过返回来处理预期问题。Handle anticipated problems by returning .. 的返回值指示转换器没有生成值, 并且绑定将使用 (如果可用) 或默认值。A return value of indicates that the converter produced no value and that the binding uses the , if available, or the default value instead. 返回值指示绑定不传输值或使用或默认值。A return value of indicates that the binding does not transfer the value or use the or default value.
